100% pure Java Libary
The driver can be used in the Java SDK Environment
Platform Independent

Package PLCCom

Interface Summary
iConnectCallback Interface for the iConnectCallback event
iConnectionStateChange Interface for the iConnectionStateChange event
 

Class Summary
authentication Authentication, checks the Serial
BasicInfoResult return PLC Basic Info
BlockListEntry return a definition of a existing Block
BlockListLengthResult return a definition of a existing Block
BlockListResult returns a list of existing blocks
ConnectCallbackNotifier Event notifier ConnectCallbackNotifier for the iConnectCallback event
ConnectionStateChangeNotifier Event notifier ConnectionStateChangeNotifier for the iConnectionStateChange event
ConnectResult Describes a connect Result
CPUModeInfoResult return CPU Mode Info
DiagnosticInfoEntry return a definition of a diagnostic entry
DiagnosticInfoResult returns a list of actual diagnostic entrys
LEDInfoResult return PLC LED Info
MC7BlockInfo returns a set of informations from actual bytestream of block
MPI_Device Represents the PLC MPI device
OperationResult Describes a PLC Operation Result
PLCClockTimeResult return PLC clock time
PLCcomDevice abstract base class of device classes
PPI_Device Represents the PLC PPI device
ReadItemRequest Describes a readitem request
ReadItemRequestCollection Describes a collection of ReadItemRequests
ReadItemResult Returns a result of a readitem operation
ReadItemResultCollection Describes a collection of ReadItemResults
ReadPLCBlockResult Returns a result of a block read operation
ReadRequest Describes a read request
ReadResult Returns a result of a read operation
SystemStatusListItemEntry represents an system status list-Item
SystemStatusListResult Returns a result of a read operation
TCP_ISO_Device Represents the PLC TCP device
WritePLCBlockRequest Describes a block write request
WriteRequest Describes a write request
WriteResult Returns a result of a write operation
 

Enum Summary
CPUModeInfoResult.eCPUModeInfo define CPU mode identifier the actual CPU mode like switch or key setting (Run, Stop or Startup)
CPUModeInfoResult.eCPUStateInfo define CPU state identifier the actual CPU state (Run, Stop or Startup)
eBaudrate define Device Com Baudrate
eBlockLanguage represents the using Blocklanguage
eBlockType enum of supported block types
eConnectionState enum of actual connection state
eDataType enum of supported Datatypes
ePLCType Define the PLC Type
eRegion Describe the typ of PLC address
eSpeed PLC/MPI circle speed default 187k
eTypeOfCommunication Enum decribes Type of Communication
LEDInfoResult.eLEDFlashing define LED flashing
LEDInfoResult.eLEDIdentifier define LED identifier
OperationResult.eQuality a enum member with the information whether a function has been successfully performed
